title: Put a Received Shipment into an Inspection Hold
description: A shipment of a critical component has arrived, but it requires quality inspection before it can be used in production.

tasks.description: Log the receipt of the shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent records the receipt of the goods from the supplier.

tasks.description: Change the inventory status of the received goods to 'Quality Inspection' or 'On Hold'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the status, making the inventory unavailable for production use.

tasks.description: Notify the quality assurance department that the shipment is ready for inspection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a notification to the QA team with the PO and part details.
